title: Help needed with generating of a new Model Configuration

content.raw:
I followed the description for the [Model Submission Process](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/Model%20Submission%20Process) . I downloaded the X2 model from fuel an copied it into the submitted\_models folder. When I tied to launch the model locally I first got errors that the link in `<uri>model://X2/meshes/x2_chassis.dae</uri>` could not be resolved. So I changed to `<uri>meshes/x2_chassis.dae</uri> ` 

Now I get the error `[GUI] [Err] [Material.cc:143] Unable to find texture[../materials/textures/x2.png] in path …`

What am I doing wrong? I did not expect such errors :-\(
content.html:
I followed the description for the Model Submission Process . I downloaded the X2 model from fuel an copied it into the submitted_models folder. When I tied to launch the model locally I first got errors that the link in <uri>model://X2/meshes/x2_chassis.dae</uri> could not be resolved. So I changed to <uri>meshes/x2_chassis.dae</uri>

Now I get the error [GUI] [Err] [Material.cc:143] Unable to find texture[../materials/textures/x2.png] in path …

What am I doing wrong? I did not expect such errors :-(
